author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Enable the showerlibrary producer for HF to work in the new CMSSW version

#### PR validation:

Tested using the test cfg file in SimG4CMS/ShowerLibraryProducer/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim79 Enable the showerlibrary producer to work in the new CMSSW version
